property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you confront this card's problem, if you have a Troublemaker at this Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 4, Swift When you move this card from home to a Problem, you may pay (1) to move another one of your Friends from home to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you confront this card's problem with more power than required, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 4, Stubborn When one of your Friends with this card at home or a Problem is dismissed, you may put it on the top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you confron this card's Problem, if none of your opponent's Friends are at that Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 5, Random Your opponent needs +1(Wild) to confront this card's problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you win a faceoff involving this card, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 4, Studious After a faceoff involving this card, you may put any events you flipped into your hand instead of the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you score at least 2 points at this card's Problem during one Score Phase, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 4, Inspired Your opponent must pay +(1) to move a character to this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Home Limit 3 When you confront this card's Problem, if you have a (Critter) Friend at that Problem, turn this card over.
